text: The South American potato tuber moth, Andean potato tuber moth or tomato stemborer (Symmetrischema tangolias) is a moth of the family Gelechiidae. It is native to South America, but has become a pest worldwide. Records include North America, Australia and New Zealand.funet.fi The wingspan is about 20 mm. The larvae are a pest on Solanum tuberosum. It attacks the tubers as well as the stems and leaves of the plant. Pupation takes place amongst the debris of the host plant. ==References== ==External links== * Australian Insects * Australian Faunal Directory Category:Symmetrischema Category:Moths of New Zealand Category:Moths described in 1913
title: Symmetrischema tangolias
